title: New ESP32-C6 Board with Zigbee Support Released
summary: LILYGO has announced a new development board featuring the ESP32-C6 RISC-V MCU, supporting Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5, and Zigbee/Thread/Matter.

title: Building a Smart Home Dashboard with T-Display S3
summary: A community member shares their project using LVGL and SquareLine Studio to create a beautiful touch interface for Home Assistant.

title: MicroPython v1.22 Released: What's New for ESP32?
summary: The latest MicroPython release brings significant performance improvements and new driver support for ESP32-S3 peripherals.

title: GitHub: Xinyuan-LilyGO/T-Deck
summary: ESP32-S3 LoRaWAN device with keyboard and trackball. Check out the latest firmware and examples.
